Mitre 10 changes names of bathroom products that were culturally insensitive https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/mitre-10-changes-names-of-bathroom-products-that-were-culturely-insensitive/IA3OZYHA55E7NJCOEW2CUDTSWY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/mitre-10-changes-names-of-bathroom-products-that-were-culturely-insensitive/IA3OZYHA55E7NJCOEW2CUDTSWY/ Soumya BhamidipatiMitre 10 said the changes were to make the products more culturally sensitive. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 23:56:55 +0000 Auckland has been one of the most expensive regions all year, but in December, the Bay of Plenty took the top spot. Photo / NZME
Auckland police launch manhunt for wheelchair-bound bank robber Sean Nicholas https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-police-launch-manhunt-for-wheelchair-bound-bank-robber-sean-nicholas/OGXOTS637JH2DJ5XDJAI4Z7CBU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-police-launch-manhunt-for-wheelchair-bound-bank-robber-sean-nicholas/OGXOTS637JH2DJ5XDJAI4Z7CBU/ Raphael FranksPolice say anyone who sees 52-year-old Sean Nicholas should call 111 immediately. Tue, 23 Jan 2024 23:38:46 +0000 Wednesday, January 24, 2024: Police launched a manhunt for wheelchair-bound bank robber Sean Nicholas, who has a warrant for his arrest for breaching release conditions in Auckland. Photo / New Zealand Police
